price: (Hadir) kaa sε: “Manka ankyerε wo sε, wontumi nnya me ho aboterε?”
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
